7.post_text:
The International Premier Tennis League (IPTL) will be hitting our shores soon! The IPTL brings together current champions, tennis legends and upcoming talent.

The OUE Singapore Slammers have some top-notch players in their side, like the blazing British great Andy Murray, the legendary Carlos Moya, Swiss teen sensation Belinda Bencic, big server Karolina Pliskova from the Czech Republic, Brazilian doubles specialist Marcelo Melo, rising Australian star Nick Kyrgios, the flamboyant Dustin Brown and 2008 Beijing Olympics Gold winner, Stan Wawrinka.

The OUE Singapore Slammers will play their home matches at the Singapore Indoor Stadium, from 18 to 20 December. Singapore will be the final leg of the IPTL 2015 season.

For more information, please visit www.iptlworld.com

11.post_text:
The Coca-Cola International Premier Tennis League (IPTL) is coming to Singapore! "Game, Set, Match!" continues now!

"Set" Question: Name four players on the Singapore Slammers 2015 team. Submit your answers in the comments.

Correct answers submitted by 5 pm (Singapore time), with a correct answer previously given during the "Game" question, will be eligible for the "Match!" lucky draw today! Correct answers to both questions will stand a chance to win one of five pairs of IPTL three-day season passes! Good luck! #happinessopen

Winners will be announced by 7 pm today.

Terms & Conditions apply, see http://CokeURL.com/GameSetMatchTCs

14.post_text:
The Coca-Cola International Premier Tennis League (IPTL) is coming to Singapore! Play "Game, Set, Match!" and stand to win one of five pairs of three-day season pass tickets (18 - 20 Dec) to IPTL Singapore 2015!

To participate, all you have to do is reply to two "Game, Set, Match!" questions on 4th of December 2015. The "Game" Question will be released on 04/12/15 @ 11 am. You have three hours to answer "Game" correctly to be eligible for the "Set" Question round @ 2 pm.

Answer both questions within the time limits and stand to win a chance to see your tennis heroes live! Good luck! #happinessopen

Terms & Conditions apply - http://CokeURL.com/GameSetMatchTCs
